name: Ball Jump 3D: Video Game Song
description:
Ball Jump 3D game for under, tale, fnaf, miner craft, bendy, and video game fans

Features:
One-touch control, easy to play
Breathtaking 3D effects
Unlimited Speed Run game.
Update video game songs and Different backgrounds weekly
Amazing sound quality – music smooth with your finger

Game rules:
Touch, Hold, and Drag to make the ball jump on the tiles.
Don't Miss the Tiles! And remember do not tap, this is not a tap tap game
Follow the rhythm of addictive challenges designed for each song.
Enjoy video game music, challenge your feeling, and your finger skills cause speed increase in next round and never stop.

DISCLAIMER:
Ball Jump 3D is an unofficial fan application. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by games or films management, or record label.
This app does not include any copyrighted material.
This app is for entertainment purposes only.

FEEDBACK:
Feel free to email us song requests, issues, comments, and suggestions, with your comments, we can add more songs and make better games ever! Thank you for download game! And Have fun!
